promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic rare lion fire-type pokemon wearing ruby armor. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or lion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Rubyraze, a a gigantic rare lion fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Barrier Break, Cling. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lion", "fire" or "Rubyraze". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, lion-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: In scorching deserts, the colossal, elusive Rubyraze reigns supreme. Master of shattering barriers and clinging to cliffs, it blazes trails for others to follow.
